page.title: 01Llanarth-Popn,Housing & Work
page.content:
In the village around the shop about 80 people live. Only 4 people do not work locally. Some are retired or are unemployed but most work locally on the farms or the Lanarth estate. There are about 28 properties which include 8 council houses and 2 farms. Most people own cars but otherwise there is a bus service to Abergavenny running once a day except weekends. There is a small village church and a social club for the village entertainment.
Post Office - This has been here since the beginning of the century. Used mainly for the cashing of pensions and allowances, also the puchasing of most foodstuffs. The shop has a notice board which is an important source of local information.
